Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I was looking for more than a basic phone, but I didn't want an expensive smart phone because I rather not be tied up with internet on my phone, and this phone was perfect. My only surprise was that it has an orange back.

Reviews.Title: Durability
Reviews.Author: Darius
Reviews.Content: The phone is light weight and Is very durable. Battery life is great 2-3 days. Was a good buy. Thanks

Reviews.Title: It was not what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Wenzel
Reviews.Content: This would bea good phone for a 10 year old but not enough fo what I wanted. I was not impressed.

ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Asha 205 White Unlocked Dual-Band Cell Phone
